name: Blackjack Fun
description:
A fun, pleasant blackjack experience on your iPhone or iPad! Beautiful graphics, nice statistics, and easy to play.

The controls are very simple. Just tap on wood! All the control "buttons" are on the wooded part of the table near the bottom of the screen. For example tap "25" to bet $25. Tap "Deal" to deal cards. When in doubt, tap on wood. :)

This classic never gets old! So double down and enjoy!
